Translations.Text: Truly do the believers succeed
Those that remain humble in their prayers
And those that shun vanity
And those that practise charity
And those that guard their chastity
Except from their spouses or from those whom they rightfully possess. For indulging in sex with them, they are, of course, not to be blamed
But whoever seeks to go beyond that â€” those are the ones that go beyond limits
And those who are true to their trusts and who keep their word
And those who guard their prayers,h
They are the ones who shall inherit
They shall inherit the Paradise. And they shall be therein forever

And We did create the human being from an extract of clay. @ @ The Nobel Prize winner for medicine Jack W. Czostak says, "...a common clay mineral montmorillonite might have played a role in helping to make RNA." RNA, is one of the three major macromolecules (along with DNA and proteins) that are essential for all known forms of life. [Source]
Then We made him/her a small seed (fertilized ovum) dropped into a resting-place, secure and compact

Then We made the seed a clinging leech-like clot of blood, then We made it a thing looking like a chewed morsel of food, then We made it bones, then We dressed the bones with flesh, and then We caused it to grow into another creature. Blessed then is Allah, the Best of the creators
Then, after that, you will indeed certainly die
Then, on the day of Resurrection, you shall indeed be raised from the dead
And We did make above you seven layers. And We have not ever been heedless about what We have created
And We send down water from the sky in measured quantities, then We cause it to settle down in the earth. And We can indeed certainly make it evaporate
Then We bring up thereby gardens of date-palm and grapes for you. There are plenty of fruits for you to eat, in those gardens
And a tree (olive) that grows out around Mount Sinai and produces oil and condiment for those who use these in their food
And certainly indeed there is a pointer for you in the cattle. We provide for you a drink out of what their bellies contain. And you have in them many benefits. And from them you get meat to eat
And on them and on the ships you are carried
And We did certainly send Noah to his people. And he said, "O my people! Worship Allah, you have no god other than Him. Will you not then fear Him

And then the leaders of those who suppressed the Truth from among his people said, "He is nothing but a man, like you. He desires to gain superiority over you. And if Allah had willed, He could certainly have sent down angels. We have not heard of such a thing happening during our forefathers' time
He is just a mad man. So keep a watch over him for some time
He said, "My Lord! Help me; for, they have rejected me

We then revealed our instructions to him: "Build the Ark under Our supervision and revealed instructions. And when, at Our command, the surface of the earth starts overflowing with water, put into it (Ark) two of every pair, and members of your family, except those among them against whom the Word (Allah's decree) has already been issued. And do not plead with Me on behalf of those who are cruel. They shall indeed be drowned
And when you and those with you go on board the Ark, say, `Praise is to Allah Who delivered us from the cruel people
And say, `My Lord! Take me to a blessed destination. And You are the One to take us to the best destination
Surely indeed there are signs in this. And surely, We do put people on trial
Then We raised up after them another generation
And We sent to them a Messenger from among them to tell them, "Worship Allah! You have no god other than Him. Will you not then take heed

And the leaders of those among his people who suppressed the Truth and considered the appointment in the hereafter a lie, and to whom We had afforded ease and comfort in the life this world, said, "This is none but a man like you! He eats of what you eat from and drinks of what you drink
And if you obey but a man like you, then surely you are doomed
Does he promise you that when you are dead and become dust and bones you shall then be brought out alive
